author: Nigella Lawson
method: Place the cheese and soured cream into a bowl and mash together with a fork until well combined. Add the avocado flesh and mash again. Add the jalapeno pepper pieces and spring onions and stir to combine. To serve, place the mixture into the centre of a serving plate, dust with the paprika and surround with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz Roquefort or St. Agur cheese,  60ml/2fl oz soured cream,  2 ripe avocados, peeled, stones removed,  35g/1½oz sliced pickled green jalapeno peppers from a jar, chopped,  2 spring onions, finely sliced,  ¼ tsp paprika,  corn tortilla chips, to serve
